specialContainmentProcedure:
Secrecy is essential to prevent knowledge of SCP-006's effects.
Personnel interacting with SCP-006 must wear Class VI BNC suits,
be briefed with false information,
and follow strict containment protocols.
Liquid extraction must be approved by O5-level personnel
and handled with care.
Personnel who come into contact with SCP-006
are to be terminated after studies are completed.
description:
SCP-006 is a small spring located west of Astrakhan.
The liquid from SCP-006, though chemically similar to mineral water,
has regenerative properties, enhancing DNA repair,
cellular duplication, and the immune system.
It has been shown to destroy harmful bacteria and viruses,
though the effects vary across different species.
